channel.title: Exilion web clients
channel.description:
Hello everyone, I have been working on this for a couple weeks. Exilion is a website kind of like Tobex, except its a lot more user-friendly than Tobex, and best of all, mine is completely ad free. You have an option to donate, and are rewarded, but that is it. No paying to get rid of ads on the page, and I don't have no stupid chatbox. (The thing that I hate the most.) I Actually plan on making a pm system for the website.
Anywho lets cut to the chase shall we?
Features: 100% working customizable webclient You can change background Has navigation links to the website homepage and forums right above the client. Shows you how many players are online. User-friendly Able to have multiple webclients for one user
Well there is one downside, I have not fixed all of the bugs, and it has a pretty decent security system. So i would like to ask you please pm me on the forums, any bugs you find.
Pics: Home page not logged in: [img]http://img687.imageshack.us/img687/3048/homenonlog.png[/img]
Logged in Navbar: [img]http://img691.imageshack.us/img691/4583/navbarlogged.png[/img]
Control Panel: [img]http://img341.imageshack.us/img341/5807/controlpanel.png[/img]
Ok go make some webclients, ty!
100% Credits go to me, because i coded everything from scratch.
Edit: Forgot link here you go: [url=http://exilion.comze.com]http://exilion.comze.com[/url] and i'm going to get a domain name soon.
Edit: Please post if you view.
